text: Laboratory confirmation of SARS-CoV infection was performed at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (Atlanta, Georgia, USA) and was based either on detection of RNA from SARS-CoV in clinical specimens (via reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction assays, RT-PCR), or by serology, as previously described [2] . Case definitions and laboratory assays employed during the outbreak in Vietnam are described in detail elsewhere [2] .
